He Yan, wouldn't the link between Prowl and Iron Raptor send the images to
her too?
----- Original Message -----
From: <gunthers8@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, April 03, 2001 9:07 PM
Subject: Re: Question your eyes, mind and thought...


> ::Halucigen::
> Halucigen was scanning Prowl's mind as soon as his images got through
> and was totally caught off guard as the used to be Prowl jumped at him..
> "Impossible" he siad baffled..."His mind is incredbly strong to fight
> through his worst night mare...Have to cal mhim down he said trying to
> flay away but the monstrous bot taking our his legs flinging him
> around...He started filling his mind once again but of dreams...Him
> and his love alone in a dark grove with no worries to bother them..
>
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> > ::Prowl::
> >
> > Images began to invade Prowl's mind, seeing Iron Raptor beneath
> > Megatron's foot. His eyes widened, trying to blot the image out of his
> > mind, but not succeeding. Depth Charge's offer to help went unnoticed
> > as Prowl backed up in the air.
> >
> > "NO!" Prowl yelled, now completely unaware of his surroundings. What
> > was in his head was his reality. External no longer mattered, the
> > battle was in his head.
> >
> > He struggled against the imaginary bonds, hate for Megatron beginning
> > to fill him. But it wasn't because of that scene alone. Something from
> > his past, something he couldn't remember, fueled it as well. He
> > jerked, trying to break the bonds that prevented him from getting to
> > Megatron. Some shots whizzed by him in the real world, but he didn't
> > care.
> >
> > As anger and a feeling of helplessness mounted, another conciousness
> > began to rise up in Prowl, the same thing he had felt the first time
> > he had transformed into his monstrous second beast mode, and it was
> > happening again.
> >
> > In his mind, his body expanded, the bonds that held him to the wall
> > groaning and then snapping as he grew. His wings shot out further
> > behind him, and his body transformed to something like a blend between
> > a human and a raptor, his back legs buffer than his front ones but
> > about the same length. The head was part that of an owl, with a raptor
> > jaw instead of a beak. Feathers stuck out of the cracks in between his
> > armor. Prowl didn't realize that the same changes were happening to
> > him in the real world.
> >
> > He was now standing in the room, topping 20 feet and glaring down at
> > Megatron. With an enraged roar, Prowl leapt forward, snapping at
> > Megatron with his massive jaws. In reality, he was soaring toward
> > Halucigen, doing the exactly same action that he was attempting to do
> > on the imaginary Megatron.
> >
> >
> >
> >
> >
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> > > OOC: I was going to let you do it but i think i will do it if that
> > is
> > > ok...
> > >
> > > ::Halucigen::
> > > Halucigen started entering horrid graphics into the mind of Prowl
> > > finding it diffucult for his large mind control.  He started to flow
> > > the images of his love Iron Raptor beneath of Megatron's foot
> > > helpless..Prowl bound up on a wall being forced ot watch it all
> > unable
> > > to help....
> > > Unrelentlessly he pushed his mind force against Prowls trying to
> > break
> > > through and make him beleive.....
>
>
